paper_abstract: A new coding for permutations is explicitly constructed and its association with the classical Lehmer coding provides a bijection of the symmetric group onto itself serving to show that six bivariable set-valued statistics are equidistributed on that group. This extends a recent result due to Cori valid for integer-valued statistics. (C) 2009 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: New permutation coding and equidistribution of set-valued statistics
